key.name: openrgb-host
key.description: The hostname or IP address of the OpenRGB server

key.name: openrgb-port
key.description: The port number of the OpenRGB server

key.name: sync-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable automatic color synchronization

key.name: sync-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds before syncing color changes

key.name: ignored-devices
key.description: List of serialized device objects that should be ignored during color synchronization

key.name: set-direct-mode-on-update
key.summary: Set Direct Mode on Every Update
key.description: If enabled, set devices to direct mode before every color update (may be needed for some devices that change modes)

key.name: night-light-disable-lights
key.description: Enable opacity adjustment when Night Light is active

key.name: night-light-opacity
key.description: Opacity level (0.0 = off, 1.0 = full brightness) when Night Light is active
